Tucson Prime knew it would be senseless to risk his minions due to his own =
tactical mistakes.  He subspaces the missile chambers and powers down the w=
eaponry.  Night Shift also submits, and subspaces his own weaponry.

The ne=
wly appointed Autobot leader still had much to learn, and he knew it.  He w=
asn't perfect, it would take some time to be as knowledgable as Optimus Pri=
me.  

"Everyone, I'm sorry, I made a mistake.  They're right, I was off in=
 my tactics, so I am asking all of you to stand down and do as told.  I wil=
l not risk anyone elses lives here this day.  Jhiaxus, you have my word.  A=
ll weapons are powered down and we will abide by Hydras' commands."

Night =
Shift was not angry at his leader.  He looks to him sincerely.

"Ya know, a=
dmittn' that you're wrong like that, that takes a lotta courage sir."

Tucs=
on Prime sighs.

" Thank you.  I'm only doing what I feel is best for every=
one's saftey."

Night Shift looks over at Rodimus  his eyes narrow.

" Ya k=
now, Tucson Prime wouldn'tve made this effort for just anyone.  He's risked=
 his spark ta try'n get ya back.  That's right, he didn't come here for som=
e half baked power trip, he came back here because he really cares about yo=
u.  The least you can do, is return the favor'n make some sorta effort ta c=
ome around'n try and remember who you are, and what you stand for.  Because=
 right now, I'm just gonna have ta call ya Hot Rod.  There ain't no Prime i=
n there that I can see.  Nope, not at all. Not one trace.  There, I said my=
 peace, and now I'm gonna do as told."

Tucson Prime does nothing to rebel =
against orders.  Yet, he listens to Night Shift carefully.

" All right Hyd=
ras, ball is in your court.  I will comply to your demands as you wish."

-=

 preperation, and leading your back up in
